author: danasheratzki
title: great hotel in the best location and amazing service
text:
This was just a brilliant experience from the time we walked into the reception. The receptionist was just superb and made the difference, his friendliness and pleasant manner was a joy and immediately made me feel we were in a special place. The hotel staff were ALL very helpful polite and treated you with a smile and respect. Very rare these days for some reason.
The room size was large, the bed comfortable, and the bathroom clean. Will stay again next year at same time. Excellent service The staff are the real secret to this hotel though They truly care about your stay. we would like to mantions two names in praticular: Alberto and Francesco!! you were amaizng and you made my vacation and my Birth day perfect. THANK YOU VERY MUCH
